lyrics.lyric: Reality
lyrics.tlyric: 现实

lyrics.lyric: Decisions as I go, to anywhere I flow
lyrics.tlyric: 随心而动，在时间的浪潮中

lyrics.lyric: Sometimes I believe, at times I'm rational
lyrics.tlyric: 有时我相信，泰然自若才是真

lyrics.lyric: I can fly high, I can go low
lyrics.tlyric: 我能飞得更高，也能走的更低

lyrics.lyric: Today I got a million. Tomorrow, I don't know
lyrics.tlyric: 今天腰缠万贯，明天命运未知

lyrics.lyric: Decisions as I go, to anywhere I flow
lyrics.tlyric: 说走咱就走，在时间的浪潮中

lyrics.lyric: Sometimes I believe, at times I'm rational
lyrics.tlyric: 有时我相信，泰然自若才是真

lyrics.lyric: I can fly high, I can go low
lyrics.tlyric: 我可以辉煌，我也可以黯淡

lyrics.lyric: Today I got a million. Tomorrow, I don't know
lyrics.tlyric: 今天腰缠万贯，明天命运未知

lyrics.lyric: Stop claiming what you own, don't think about the show
lyrics.tlyric: 不再满足眼前的生活，一切都已是过眼云烟

lyrics.lyric: We're all playing the same game, waiting on our loan
lyrics.tlyric: 千篇一律的生活，期待梦想成真的那天

lyrics.lyric: We're unknown and known, special and a clone
lyrics.tlyric: 貌同实异，徒有殊处

lyrics.lyric: Hate will make you cautious, love will make you glow
lyrics.tlyric: 仇恨让你谨慎，爱心让你发光

lyrics.lyric: Make me feel the warmth, make me feel the cold
lyrics.tlyric: 人生自古多磨难，世间冷暖皆自知

lyrics.lyric: It's written in our stories, it's written on the walls
lyrics.tlyric: 我们的故事被写下，墙间字迹斑驳

lyrics.lyric: This is our call, we rise and we fall
lyrics.tlyric: 内心的呼唤，燃烧又熄灭

lyrics.lyric: Dancing in the moonlight, don't we have it all?
lyrics.tlyric: 月光下载歌载舞，这是我们的人生

lyrics.lyric: Decisions as I go, to anywhere I flow
lyrics.tlyric: 说走咱就走，在时间的浪潮中

lyrics.lyric: Sometimes I believe, at times I'm rational
lyrics.tlyric: 有时我相信，泰然自若才是真

lyrics.lyric: I can fly high, I can go low
lyrics.tlyric: 我可以光彩照人，也可以黯淡

lyrics.lyric: Today I got a million. Tomorrow, I don't know
lyrics.tlyric: 今天腰缠万贯，明天命运未知

lyrics.lyric: Make me feel the warmth, make me feel the cold
lyrics.tlyric: 人生自古多磨难，世间冷暖皆自知

lyrics.lyric: It's written in our stories, it's written on the walls
lyrics.tlyric: 我们的故事被写下，墙间字迹斑驳

lyrics.lyric: This is our call, we rise and we fall
lyrics.tlyric: 内心的呼唤，燃烧又熄灭

lyrics.lyric: Dancing in the moonlight, don't we have it all?
lyrics.tlyric: 月光下载歌载舞，这是我们的人生

lrc.lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Janieck van de Polder
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Felix De Laet/Janieck van de Polder/Radboud Miedema

[00:18.880]Sometimes I believe, at times I'm rational
[00:22.710]I can fly high, I can go low
[00:26.520]Today I got a million. Tomorrow, I don't know
[00:30.010]
[00:30.620]Decisions as I go, to anywhere I flow
[00:34.460]Sometimes I believe, at times I'm rational

[00:42.250]Today I got a million. Tomorrow, I don't know
[00:45.790]
[01:02.280]Stop claiming what you own, don't think about the show

[01:13.820]Hate will make you cautious, love will make you glow
[01:18.020]
[01:18.320]Make me feel the warmth, make me feel the cold
[01:21.770]It's written in our stories, it's written on the walls
[01:25.660]This is our call, we rise and we fall
[01:29.500]Dancing in the moonlight, don't we have it all?

[02:04.990]I can fly high, I can go low

[02:20.720]This is our call, we rise and we fall
[02:24.560]Dancing in the moonlight, don't we have it all?
